definition: first month of the lunar year
straight/upright/proper/main/principal/to correct/to rectify/exactly/just (at that time)/right (in that place)/(math.) positive

sentences.english: The government decided to take measures to put a stop to political abuses.
sentences.chinese: 政府決定採取措施以煞住政治上的不正之風。

sentences.english: Persons in the know also revealed some malpractices at the fair.
sentences.chinese: 知情人披露了一些交易會上的不正之風。

sentences.english: We must reform the political abuses by every possible means.
sentences.chinese: 我們必須千方百計地煞住政治上的不正之風。

sentences.english: Indirect election puts an end to the possible unhealthy tendencies during elections.
sentences.chinese: 間接選舉杜絕了選舉過程中可能產生的不正之風。
